      • getValue

        public static String getValue(Element parent,
              String tagName)
        Get the value (i.e. text content) of the first child of the specified element which has the specified tag name. This method returns null if the specified element has no child element with the specified tag name.
        Parameters:
        parent -
        tagName -
        Returns:

      • getIntValue

        public static int getIntValue(Element parent,
              String tagName)
        Get the value (i.e. text content) of the first child of the specified element which has the specified tag name. The value is assumed to be, and converted to an integer. This method returns 0 (zero) if the specified element has no child element with the specified tag name.
        Parameters:
        parent -
        tagName -
        Returns:
